author: Staff Reporter
text:
A dacoit fell to his death from the terrace of a lodge here in a bid to escape arrest by the police on Sunday evening.

Thangavel (54) was a co-accused with Mani (50) in a case of dacoity at the house of Usman Seth, an estate owner in Yercaud, last week.

According to sources, the police came to know of their presence here based on the confession of three other accused, who were arrested in connection with the Yercaud crime.

Sensing the arrival of the police, the accused were hiding on the terrace of the lodge. Upon arrival of the police, Thangavel slid down a pipeline to escape and fell to his death as the pipeline collapsed under his weight. Mani was arrested by the police.

title: Man falls to death
